Notes for Users of this document: Coding is more Phonetic in Baraha. Special care – Baraha coding uses ‘e’ and ‘o’ (in Sanskrit) for sound E and O. we have used capital letters as it matches with Unicode/general conventions in this document. ~g is nasal of ka varga (gna) ~j is nasal of cha varga (jya) H is visargam Vedic/Swara symbols – q anudAttam, # swaritam, 
$ dheerga swaritam, & avagraha,  ~M nasal symbol ushmAn codes s, S, Sha (saraswati, Sankar, puShpam) Confirm corrections given for TB 2.5-2.8 Books are incorporated Kindly notify any major errors or inadvertent deletions to 
mail id- vedavms@gmail.com OM namaH paramAtmanE, SrI mahAgaNapatayE namaH SrI guruByO namaH, haqriqH OM 2	kRuShNa yajurvEdIya taittirIya brAhmaNE dvitIyAShTakaM 2.5	dvitIyAShTakE pa~jcamaH prapAThakaH - upahOmaSEShaH 2.5.1	 upahOmAH T.B.2.5.1.1

prAqNO ra#kShatiq viSvaqmEja#t | 
iryO# BUqtvA ba#huqdhA baqhUni# | sa ithsarvaqM ~MvyA#naSE || yO dEqvO dEqvEShu# viqBUraqntaH |
AvRu#dUqdAt kShEtriya#ddhvaqgadvRuShA$ | tamit prAqNaM manaqsO pa#SikShata | agra#M dEqvAnA#-miqdama#ttu nO haqviH || mana#saqScittEqdam |
BUqtaM Bavya#M ca gupyatE | taddhi dEqvEShva#griqyam || 1 (10) T.B.2.5.1.2
A na# Etu puraScaqram | saqha dEqvairiqma(gm) hava$m | manaqH SrEya#si SrEyasi | karma#n. yaqj~japa#tiqM dadha#t || juqShatA$M mEq vAgiqda(gm) haqviH |
viqrADdEqvI puqrOhi#tA | haqvyaqvADana# pAyinI || yayA# rUqpANi# bahuqdhA vada#nti | pESA(gm)#si dEqvAH pa#raqmE jaqnitrE$ | sAnO# viqrADana#pasPurantI | 2 (10) T.B.2.5.1.3

vAgdEqvI ju#ShatAmiqda(gm) haqviH || 
cakShu#r dEqvAnAqM jyOti#raqmRutEq nya#ktam |
aqsya viqj~jAnA#ya bahuqdhA nidhI#yatE | tasya# suqmna-ma#SImahi | mA nO# hAsId-vicakShaqNam || AyuqrinnaqH pratI$ryatAm | ana#ndhAq-ScakShu#ShA vaqyam | jIqvA jyOti#raSImahi |
suvaqrjyOti#-ruqtAmRuta$m || SrOtrE#Na Baqdra muqta SRu#Nvanti saqtyam ( ) |  SrOtrE#Naq vAca#M bahuqdhOdya mA#nAm | SrOtrE#Naq mOda#Scaq maha#Sca SrUyatE |
SrOtrE#Naq sarvAq diSaq ASRu#NOmi ||

yEnaq prAcyA# uqta da#kShiqNA | praqtIcyai# diqSaH SRuqNvantyu#ttaqrAt | tadicCrOtra#M bahuqdhOdyamA#nam | aqrAnna nEqmiH pariq sarva#M baBUva || 3 (17) (aqgriq - yamana#pasPurantI - saqtya(gm) saqpta ca#) (A1) 2.5.2	 upahOmAH T.B.2.5.2.1 uqdEhi# vAjiqnyO a#syaqPsva#ntaH | iqda(gm) rAqShTramAvi#Sa sUqnRutA#vat |
yO rOhi#tOq viSva#miqdaM jaqjAna# | sa nO# rAqShTrEShuq sudhi#tAndadhAtu || rOha(gm)# rOhaq(gm)q rOhi#taq Aru#rOha | praqjABiqrvRuddhi#M jaqnuShA#muqpastha$m |

tABiqH sa(gm)ra#bdhO avidaqthShaDuqrvIH | gAqtuM praqpaSya#nniqha rAqShTramAhA$H || AhA#r.ShId-rAqShTramiqha rOhi#taH | mRudhOq vyA$sthaqdaBa#yaM nO astu | 4 (10) T.B.2.5.2.2 aqsmaBya#M dyAvApRuthivIq Sakva#rIBiH |
rAqShTraM du#hAthAmiqha rEqvatI#BiH || vima#mar.Saq rOhi#tO viqSvarU#paH | saqmAqcaqkrAqNaH praqruhOq ruha#Sca | diva#gaqMtvAya# mahaqtA ma#hiqmnA |
vi nO# rAqShTramu#nattuq paya#sAq svEna# || yAstEq viSaqstapa#sA saMbaBUqvuH | gAqyaqtraM ~Mvaqthsamanuq tAstaq Agu#H | tAstvA vi#Santuq maha#sAq svEna# |
saM mA#tA puqtrO aqByE#tuq rOhi#taH || 5 (10) T.B.2.5.2.3 yUqyamu#grA marutaH pRuSnimAtaraH | indrE#Na saqyujAq pramRu#NIthaq SatrUn# | A vOq rOhi#tO aSRuNOdaBidyavaH |
trisa#ptAsO marutaH svAdusaMmudaH || rOhi#tOq dyAvA#pRuthiqvI ja#jAna | tasmiq(gg)qstantu#M paramEqShThI ta#tAna | tasmi#~jCiSriyE aqja Eka#pAt |
adRu(gm)# haqddyAvA#pRuthiqvI balE#na || rOhi#tOq dyAvA#pRuthiqvI a#dRu(gm)hat | tEnaq suva#H staBiqtaM tEnaq nAka#H | 6 (10) T.B.2.5.2.4
sO aqntari#kShEq raja#sO viqmAna#H | tEna# dEqvAH suvaqranva#vindann || suqSEva#M tvA BAqnavO# dIdiqvA(gm)sa$m | sama#grAsO juqhvO# jAtavEdaH |
uqkShanti# tvA vAqjinaqmA GRuqtEna# | sa(gm)sa#magnE yuvasEq BOja#nAni || agnEq Sarddha# mahaqtE sauBa#gAya | tava# dyuqmnA-nyu#ttaqmAni# santu | saM jA$spaqtya(gm) suqyamaqmAkRu#NuShva |
SaqtrUqyaqtAmaqBiti#ShThAq mahA#si ( ) || 7 (10) (aq- stvEqtuq rOhi#tOq - nAkOq - mahA(gm)#si) (A2) 2.5.3	 upahOmAH T.B.2.5.3.1

puna#rnaq indrO# maqGavA# dadAtu | dhanA#ni SaqkrO Ganya#H suqrAdhA$H | aqrvAqcIna#M kRuNutAM ~MyAciqtO mana#H | SruqShTI nO# aqsya haqviShO# juShAqNaH || yAni# nO jiqnan dhanA#ni | jaqhartha# SUra maqnyunA$ |
indrAnu#vinda naqstAni# | aqnEna# haqviShAq puna#H || indraq ASA$ByaqH pari# | sarvAqByO&Ba#yaM karat | 8 (10) T.B.2.5.3.2

jEtAq SatrUqnq. vica#r.ShaNiH || AkU$tyai tvAq kAmA#ya tvA saqmRudhE$ tvA | puqrO da#dhE amRutaqtvAya# jIqvasE$ || AkU#timaqsyAva#sE | kAma#masyaq samRu#ddhyai | indra#sya yu~jjatEq dhiya#H || AkU#tiM dEqvIM mana#saH puqrO da#dhE | yaqj~jasya# mAqtA suqhavA# mE astu |
yadiqcCAmiq mana#sAq sakA#maH | viqdEya#mEnaqddhRuda#yEq nivi#ShTam || 9 (10) T.B.2.5.3.3

sEdaqgniraqgnI(gm) ratyE$tyaqnyAn | yatra# vAqjI tana#yO vIqDupA#NiH | saqhasra#pAthA aqkSharA# saqmEti# || ASA#nAM tvA &&SApAqlEBya#H | caqturByO# aqmRutE$ByaH | iqdaM BUqtasyAddhya#kShEByaH | viqdhEma# haqviShA# vaqyam || viSvAq ASAq madhu#nAq sa(gm)sRu#jAmi | aqnaqmIqvA Apaq OSha#dhayO Bavantu | aqyaM ~Myaja#mAnOq mRudhOq vya#syatAm ( ) | 10 (10) T.B.2.5.3.4
agRu#BItAH paqSava#H santuq sarvE$ || aqgniH sOmOq varu#NO miqtra indra#H | bRuhaqspati#H saviqtA yaH sa#haqsrI | pUqShA nOq gOBiqrava#sAq sara#svatI |
tvaShTA# rUqpANiq sama#naktu yaqj~jaiH || tvaShTA# rUqpANiq dadha#tIq sara#svatI | pUqShA Baga(gm)# saviqtA nO# dadAtu | bRuhaqspatiqr-dadaqdindra#H saqhasra$m |
miqtrO dAqtA varu#NaqH sOmO# aqgniH || 11 (9) (kaqraqn - nivi#ShTa - masyatAqM - +nava# ca) (A3) 2.5.4	 upahOmAH T.B.2.5.4.1

A nO# Baraq Baga#mindra dyuqmanta$m | ni tE# dEqShNasya# dhImahi prarEqkE | uqrva i#va paprathEq kAmO# aqsmE | tamApRu#NA vasupatEq vasU#nAm || iqmaM kAma#M mandayAq gOBiqraSvai$H | caqndrava#tAq rAdha#sA paqpratha#Sca | suqvaqryavO# maqtiBiqstuByaqM ~MviprA$H | indrA#yaq vAha#H kuSiqkAsO# akrann || indra#syaq nu vIqryA#Niq pravO#cam | yAni# caqkAra# prathaqmAni# vaqjrI | 12 (10) T.B.2.5.4.2
ahaq-nnahiqmanvaqpasta#tarda | pra vaqkShaNA# aBinaqt parva#tAnAm || ahaqnnahiqM parva#tE SiSriyAqNam | tvaShTA$&smaiq vajra(gg)# svaqrya#M tatakSha |
vAqSrA i#va dhEqnavaqH syanda#mAnAH | a~jja#H samuqdra-mava#jagmuqrApa#H || vRuqShAqyamA#NO&vRuNItaq sOma$m | trika#drukEShva-pibath suqtasya# | A sAya#kaM maqGavA# dattaq vajra$m |
aha#nnEnaM prathamaqjA mahI#nAm || 13 (10) T.B.2.5.4.3 yadindrAha#n-prathamaqjA mahI#nAm | AnmAqyinAqmami#nAqH prOta mAqyAH |
Ath sUrya#M jaqnayaqn dyAmuqShAsa$m | tAqdIknAq SatrUqnna kilA#vivithsE || aha#n vRuqtraM ~MvRu#traqtaraqM ~Mvya(gm)sa$m | indrOq vajrE#Na mahaqtA vaqdhEna# |

skandhA(gm)#sIvaq kuli#SEnAq vivRu#kNA | ahi#H Sayata upaqpRuk-pRu#thiqvyAm || aqyOqddhyEva duqrmadaq A hi juqhvE | maqhAqvIqraM tu# vibAqdha-mRu#jIqSham | 14 (10) T.B.2.5.4.4 nAtA#rIrasyaq samRu#tiM ~MvaqdhAnA$m |

sa(gm) ruqjAnA$H pipiShaq indra#SatruH || viSvOq vihA#yA araqtiH | vasu#rdadhEq hastEq dakShi#NE | taqraNiqrna Si#Srathat | Sraqvaqsya#yAq na Si#Srathat | viSva#smAq idi#ShuddhyaqsE | dEqvaqtrA haqvyamUhi#ShE |
viSva#smAq ithsuqkRutEq vAra#mRuNvati | aqgnir dvArAq vyRu#Nvati || 15 (10) T.B.2.5.4.5

uduqjjihA#nO aqBi kAma#mIqrayann# | praqpRuq~jcan viSvAq Buva#nAni pUqrvathA$ | A kEqtunAq suSha#middhOq yaji#ShThaH | kAma#M nO agnE aqBiha#rya diqgByaH || juqShAqNO haqvyamaqmRutE#Shu dUqDhya#H | A nO# raqyiM ba#huqlA~g gOma#tIqmiSha$m |
nidhE#hiq yakSha#daqmRutE#Shuq BUShann# || aSvi#nA yaqj~jamAga#tam | dAqSuShaqH puru#da(gm)sasA | pUqShA ra#kShatu nO raqyim || 16 (10) T.B.2.5.4.6
iqmaM ~Myaqj~jamaqSvinA# vaqrddhaya#ntA | iqmau raqyiM ~Myaja#mAnAya dhattam | iqmau paqSUn ra#kShatAM ~MviqSvatO# naH | pUqShA na#H pAtuq sadaqma-pra#yucCann || pra tE# maqhE sa#rasvati |
suBa#gEq vAji#nIvati | saqtyaqvAcE# BarE maqtim || iqdaM tE# haqvyaM GRuqtava#th-sarasvati | saqtyaqvAcEq praBa#rEmA haqvI(gm)Shi# | iqmAni# tE duriqtA

sauBa#gAni ( ) | tEBi#rvaqya(gm) suqBagA#saH syAma || 17 (11) (vaqj - yrahI#nA - mRujIqShaM - ~MvyRu#Nvati - rakShatu nO raqyi(gm) - sauBa#gAqnyEka#M ca) (A4) 2.5.5	 upahOmAH T.B.2.5.5.1 yaqj~jO rAqyO yaqj~ja I#SEq vasU#nAm | yaqj~jaH saqsyAnA#muqta su#kShitIqnAm |

yaqj~ja iqShTaH pUqrvaci#ttiM dadhAtu | yaqj~jO bra#hmaqNvA(gm) apyE#tu dEqvAn || aqyaM ~Myaqj~jO va#rddhatAqM gOBiqraSvai$H | iqyaM ~MvEdi#H svapaqtyA suqvIrA$ | iqdaM baqrq.hirati# baqraq.hI(gg)ShyaqnyA |
iqmaM ~Myaqj~jaM ~MviSvE# avantu dEqvAH || Baga# Eqva Baga#vA(gm) astu dEvAH | tEna# vaqyaM Baga#vantaH syAma | 18 (10) T.B.2.5.5.2
taM tvA# Bagaq sarvaq ijjO#havImi | sa nO# Baga pura EqtA Ba#vEqha || Bagaq praNE#taqr Bagaq satya#rAdhaH | BagEqmAM dhiyaqmuda#vaq dada#nnaH |
Bagaq praNO# janayaq gOBiqraSvai$H | Bagaq pra nRuBi#r nRuqvanta#H syAma || SaSva#tIqH samAq upa#yanti lOqkAH | SaSva#tIqH samAq upa#yaqntyApa#H |
iqShTaM pUqrta(gm) SaSva#tInAq(gm)q samA#nA(gm) SASvaqtEna# | haqviShEqShTvA &naqntaM ~MlOqkaM paraqmAru#rOha || 19 (10) T.B.2.5.5.3

iqyamEqva sA yA pra#thaqmA vyaucCa#t | sA rUqpANi# kurutEq pa~jca# dEqvI || dvE svasA#rau vayataqstantra#mEqtat | saqnAqtanaqM ~Mvita#taq(gm)q ShaNma#yUKam | avAqnyA(gg) stantU$n kiqratO# dhaqttO aqnyAn |
nAva#pRuqjyAtEq na ga#mAtEq anta$m || A vO# yantUdavAqhAsO# aqdya | vRuShTiqM ~MyE viSvE# maqrutO# juqnanti# | aqyaM ~MyO aqgnir ma#rutaqH sami#ddhaH |
EqtaM ju#ShaddhvaM kavayO yuvAnaH || 20 (10) T.B.2.5.5.4 dhAqrAqvaqrA maqrutO# dhRuqShNuvO#jasaH | mRuqgA na BIqmAsta#viqShEBi#-rUqrmiBi#H |

aqgnayOq na Su#SucAqnA Ru#jIqShiNa#H | BrumiqM dhama#ntaq upaq gA a#vRuNvata || "vica#kramEq{1}", "trirdEqvaH{2}"|| AvEqdhasaqM nIla#pRuShThaM bRuqhanta$m | bRuhaqspatiq(gm)q sada#nE sAdayaddhvam | sAqdadyO#niqM damaq AdI#diqvA(gm)sa$m |
hira#NyavarNamaruqSha(gm) sa#pEma || sa hi Suci#H Saqtapa#traqH sa SuqndhyUH | 21 (10) T.B.2.5.5.5
hira#NyavASIriShiqraH su#vaqraq.ShAH | bRuhaqspatiqH sa svA#vEqSa RuqShvAH | pUqrU saKi#Bya A suqtiM ka#riShThaH || pUShaq(gg)qstava# vraqtE vaqyam |
na ri#ShyEma kaqdA caqna | stOqtAra#sta iqha sma#si || yAstE# pUShaqnnAvO# aqntaH sa#muqdrE | hiqraqNyayI#raqntari#kShEq cara#nti | yABi#ryAsi dUqtyA(gm) sUrya#sya |
kAmE#na kRuqtaH Srava# iqcCamA#naH || 22 (10) T.B.2.5.5.6
ara#NyAqnyara#NyAnyaqsau | yA prEvaq naSya#si | kaqthA grAmaqM na pRu#cCasi | na tvAq BIri#va vindatI(3) || vRuqShAqraqvAyaq vada#tE | yaduqpAva#ti cicciqkaH |
AqGAqTIBi#riva dhAqvayann# | aqraqNyAqnir-ma#hIyatE || uqta gAva# ivAdann | uqtO vESmE#va dRuSyatE | 23 (10) T.B.2.5.5.7
uqtO a#raNyAqniH sAqyam | SaqkaqTIri#va sarjati || gAmaq~ggaiShaq Ahva#yati | dArvaq~ggaiShaq upA#vadhIt | vasa#nnaraNyAqnyA(gm) sAqyam |

akru#kShaqditi# manyatE || na vA a#raNyAqnir.ha#nti | aqnyaScEnnABiqgacCa#ti | svAqdOH Pala#sya jaqgdhvA | yatraq kAmaqM nipa#dyatE ( ) || A~jja#nagandhI(gm) suraqBIm | baqhvaqnnAmakRu#ShIvalAm | prAhaM mRuqgANA$M mAqtara$m | aqraqNyAqnIma#Sa(gm)-siSham || 24 (14) (syAqmaq - ruqrOqhaq - yuqvAqnaqH - Suqndh - yUriqcCamA#nO - dRuSyatEq - nipa#dyatE caqtvAri# ca) (A5) 2.5.6	 upahOmAH T.B.2.5.6.1
vArtra#hatyAyaq Sava#sE | pRuqtaqnAq-sAhyA#ya ca | indraqtvA-&&va#rtayAmasi || suqbrahmA#NaM ~MvIqrava#ntaM bRuqhanta$m | uqruM ga#BIqraM pRuqthubu#ddhnamindra |

Sruqtar.Shi#-muqgrama#Bi-mAtiqShAha$m | aqsmaBya#M ciqtraM ~MvRuSha#Na(gm) raqyiM dA$H || kShEqtriqyai tvAq nir.Ru#tyai tvA | druqhO mu#~jcAmiq varu#Nasyaq pASA$t | aqnAqgasaqM brahma#NE tvA karOmi | 25 (10) T.B.2.5.6.2
SiqvE tEq dyAvA#pRuthiqvI uqBE iqmE || SaM tE# aqgniH saqhAdBira#stu | SaM dyAvA#pRuthiqvI saqhauSha#dhIBiH | Samaqntari#kSha(gm) saqha vAtE#na tE |

SaM tEq cata#sraH praqdiSO# Bavantu || yA daivIqScata#sraH praqdiSa#H | vAta#patnIraqBi sUryO# vicaqShTE | tAsA$M tvA jaqrasaq Ada#dhAmi | pra yakShma# Etuq nir.Ru#tiM parAqcaiH || amO#ciq yakShmA$d-duriqtA-dava#rtyai | 26 (10) T.B.2.5.6.3

druqhaH pASAqnnir.Ru#tyaiq cOda#mOci | ahAq ava#rtiqmavi#dath syOqnam | apya#BUd-BaqdrE su#kRuqtasya# lOqkE || sUrya#mRuqtaM tama#sOq grAhyAq yat | dEqvA amu#~jcaq-nnasRu#jaqnvyE#nasaH | EqvamaqhamiqmaM kShE$triqyAjjA#miSaq(gm)qsAt |
druqhO mu#~jcAmiq varu#Nasyaq pASA$t || bRuha#spatE yuqvamindra#Scaq vasva#H | diqvyasyE#SAthE uqta pArthi#vasya | dhaqtta(gm) raqyi(gg) stu#vaqtE kIqrayE# cit | 27 (10) T.B.2.5.6.4
yUqyaM pA#ta svaqstiBiqH sadA# naH || dEqvAqyudhaqmindraqmAjOhu#vAnAH | viqSvAqvRudha#maqBi yE rakSha#mANAH | yEna# haqtA dIqrGamaddhvA#naqmAyann# |
aqnaqntamarthaqmani#varth-syamAnAH || yattE# sujAtE hiqmava#thsu BEShaqjam | maqyOqBUH SaMta#mAq yaddhRuqdO&si# |
tatO# nO dEhi sIbalE || aqdO giqriByOq adhiq yat praqdhAva#si | saq(gm)qSOBa#mAnA kaqnyE#va SuBrE | 28 (10) T.B.2.5.6.5
tAM tvAq mudga#lA haqviShA# varddhayanti | sA na#H sIbalE raqyimABA#jayEqha || pUrva#M dEvAq apa#rENA-nuqpaSyaq~jjanma#BiH | janmAqnyava#raiqH parA#Ni | vEdA#ni dEvA aqyamaqsmItiq mAm |
aqha(gm) hiqtvA SarI#raM jaqrasa#H paqrastA$t ||

prAqNAqpAqnau cakShuqH SrOtra$m | vAcaqM mana#siq saMBRu#tAm | hiqtvA SarI#raM jaqrasa#H paqrastA$t | A BUtiqM BUti#M ~Mvaqyama#SnavAmahai ( ) || iqmA Eqva tA uqShasOq yAH pra#thaqmA vyaucCann# | tA dEqvya#H kurvatEq pa~jca# rUqpA |
SaSva#tIqrnAva#pRujyanti | na ga#maqntyanta$m || 29 (14) (kaqrOq - myava#rtyai - ci - cCuBrE - &SnavAmahai caqtvAri# ca) (A6) 2.5.7	 upahOmAH T.B.2.5.7.1
vasU#nAqM tvA&&dhI#tEna | ruqdrANA#mUqrmyA | AqdiqtyAnAqM tEja#sA | viSvE#ShAM dEqvAnAqM kratu#nA | maqrutAqmEmnA# juhOmiq svAhA$ || aqBiBU#ti-raqhamAga#mam | indra#saKA svAqyudha#H |
AsvASA#su duqShShaha#H || iqdaM ~MvarcO# aqgninA# daqttamAgA$t | yaSOq BargaqH sahaq OjOq bala#M ca | 30 (10) T.B.2.5.7.2

dIqrGAqyuqtvAya# SaqtaSA#radAya | prati#gRuBNAmi mahaqtE vIqryA#ya || Ayu#rasi viqSvAyu#rasi | saqrvAyu#rasiq sarvaqmAyu#rasi | sarva#M maq Ayu#rBUyAt | sarvaqmAyu#rgESham || BUrBuvaqH suva#H || aqgnir-dharmE#NAnnAqdaH | mRuqtyur-dharmEqNAnna#patiH |
brahma# kShaqtra(gg) svAhA$ || 31 (10) T.B.2.5.7.3
